meta.title: ILLA Cloud Components
meta.description: Learn how to use the prebuilt components to customize your app in ILLA Cloud.

headerContent.title: Library of built-in components
headerContent.description: ILLA provides a range of commonly used front-end development components, enabling users to easily build front-end interfaces and respond to user actions and display data through simple drag-and-drop operations. Users can construct complex components such as tables, charts, forms, lists, and more through ILLA.

contentList.name: Upload
contentList.description: The 'Upload' component in ILLA Cloud provides a way for users to upload any type of files to their application.

contentList.name: Switch
contentList.description: The 'Switch' component in ILLA Cloud provides a toggle switch that allows users to turn on or turn off a particular setting or feature.

contentList.name: Select
contentList.description: The 'Select' component in ILLA Cloud is a drop-down selector that allows users to choose from a list of options, providing a user-friendly and space-efficient way to input data.

contentList.name: Radio group
contentList.description: The 'Radio Group' component in ILLA Cloud is a radio selector that allows users to choose one option from a list of choices, providing a simple and clear way to input and manage data.

contentList.name: Checkbox Group
contentList.description: The 'Checkbox Group' component in ILLA Cloud is a checkbox selector that allows users to select multiple options from a list, providing a simple and efficient way to manage data.

contentList.name: Chart
contentList.description: The 'Chart' component in ILLA Cloud displays multiple types of charts based on linked data, providing users with clear and visually appealing representations of complex data.

contentList.name: Tables
contentList.description: The 'Table' component in ILLA Cloud displays data from a database in a tabular format, making it easy for users to view, sort, and analyze large amounts of information at a glance.

contentList.name: PDF
contentList.description: The 'PDF' component in ILLA Cloud is a display element that allows users to view and interact with PDF files within the application.

contentList.name: Video
contentList.description: The 'Video' component in ILLA Cloud is a display element that allows users to play and interact with videos within the application.

meta.title: ILLA Cloud Integrations
meta.description: Learn how to use the integrations to access and work with data resource.

headerContent.title: Connect to any data source
headerContent.description: With the ability to connect to mainstream databases or any data connected through APIs, ILLA Cloud allows developers to tightly integrate data obtained from the back-end with front-end components. This enables developers to easily write data calls and achieve extensive information interaction by adding resources and actions to response to user events.

contentList.name: MySQL
contentList.description: An open-source relational database management system that enables efficient storage and retrieval of data.

contentList.name: PostgreSQL
contentList.description: An advanced open-source relational database management system known for its stability and reliability.

contentList.name: MariaDB
contentList.description: A community-driven open-source fork of MySQL with enhanced features and performance improvements.

contentList.name: TiDB
contentList.description: A distributed SQL database that supports both SQL and NoSQL workloads with horizontal scalability and fault tolerance.

contentList.name: Redis
contentList.description: An in-memory data structure store often used as a database, cache, and message broker.

contentList.name: MongoDB
contentList.description: A NoSQL document database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents.

contentList.name: Elastic Search
contentList.description: A distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine capable of handling large volumes of data.

contentList.name: Firebase
contentList.description: A platform that offers backend services, including a real-time database, authentication, cloud messaging, and more, for mobile and web applications.

contentList.name: Supabase DB
contentList.description: An open-source alternative to Firebase that offers real-time database, authentication, and storage services.

contentList.name: Clickhouse
contentList.description: An open-source column-oriented database management system designed for online analytical processing (OLAP) workloads.

contentList.name: Amazon DynamoDB
contentList.description: A fully managed NoSQL database service that offers high performance, scalability, and reliability.

contentList.name: Snowflake
contentList.description: A cloud-based data warehousing platform designed for large-scale data storage and analysis.

contentList.name: Appwrite
contentList.description: An open-source backend server platform that provides authentication, database, and storage services for web and mobile applications.

contentList.name: Oracle DB
contentList.description: A high-performance, scalable relational database management system that offers a comprehensive set of features and tools.

contentList.name: CouchDB
contentList.description: A NoSQL document-oriented database that provides a distributed architecture with incremental replication and conflict detection.

contentList.name: Microsoft SQL Server
contentList.description: A relational database management system developed by Microsoft that supports transaction processing, business intelligence, and analytics applications.

contentList.name: Neon
contentList.description: The fully managed multi-cloud Postgres with a generous free tier. We separated storage and compute to offer autoscaling, branching, and bottomless storage.

contentList.name: Hydra
contentList.description: An open source, column-oriented RDBMS built on Postgres

contentList.name: Hugging Face Inference API
contentList.description: An API that offers easy-to-use pre-trained natural language processing models for inference tasks.

contentList.name: Hugging Face Inference Endpoint
contentList.description: An endpoint that allows for easy deployment and scaling of Hugging Face models for inference tasks.

contentList.name: REST API
contentList.description: A web-based architectural style for building web services that use HTTP protocols to exchange data between client and server.

contentList.name: S3
contentList.description: A cloud-based object storage service that provides scalable, secure, and durable data storage for various use cases.

contentList.name: SMTP
contentList.description: A protocol used for sending and receiving email messages over the internet.

contentList.name: GraphQL
contentList.description: A query language for APIs that provides a more efficient, powerful, and flexible alternative to traditional REST APIs.

contentList.name: Google Sheets
contentList.description: A cloud-based spreadsheet software that enables users to create and edit spreadsheets online while collaborating with others in real-time.

contentList.name: Airtable
contentList.description: A flexible and collaborative platform for managing projects, data, and teams seamlessly.
